text:
Blaze and the Monster Machines is a children’s animated television show. It first aired on October 13, 2014. It airs on Nick Jr. and Nickelodeon.
Seasons.
Blaze and the Monster Machines season 1 first aired on October 13, 2014. Season 1 ended on February 18, 2016, though season 2 first aired in September 2015. Season 2 ended on September 29, 2016. Season 3 first aired on October 10, 2016. Season 3 ended on February 22, 2018. Season 4 first aired on March 26, 2018. Season 4 ended on September 9, 2019. Season 5 was announced in May 2018. Season 5 first aired on August 16, 2019.
Cast.
Blaze is voiced by Nolan North.
